.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkImageMemoryRequirementsInfo2-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_IMAGE_MEMORY_REQUIREMENTS_INFO_2
* [[VUID-VkImageMemoryRequirementsInfo2-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkImagePlaneMemoryRequirementsInfo
